definitions.title: vb. denom.
definitions.body: use of proverb, speak in parables or sentences of poetry, esp. Ezek.;—

definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Impf. [[יִמְשׁׂל]] Ez Eze 16:44; 3 mpl. [[יִמְשְׁלוּ]] Eze 12:23; Imv. [[מְשׁׂל]] Eze 17:2, Eze 24:3; Inf. cstr. [[מְשׁׂל]] Eze 18:3 Pt. [[משֵׁל]] Eze 16:44, pl. [[משְׁלִים]] Eze 18:2, Nu 21:27; —use a proverb: [[מָשָׁל]]´[[מ]] Ez Eze 12:23, Eze 18:3; a parablec. [[אֶל־]] Eze 17:2 (‖[[חוּד חִידָה]]), Eze 24:3; c. [[עַל־]] Eze 18:2, and ([[מָשָׁל]] appar. om.) [[הִנֵּה כָּל־]] [[הַמּשֵׁל עָלַיִךְ יִמְשׁׂל]] Eze 16:44 (but this is awkward; point [[הִנֵּה כּׂל הַמָּשָׁל]]); [[משְׁלִים]] Nu 21:27 (JE).,

definitions.title: Pi.
definitions.body: Pt. [[הֲêלאׁ מְמַשֵּׁל מְשָׁלִים הוּא]] Ez Eze 21:5 is he not a maker of parables?
